Dialogue.Page: Um, this might be a strange question, but.. <Pause=1> How many comets are there in our star system?

DialogueOption.Text: Uh.. There should be just one comet. Why?
I think there might be two comets in the star system.

Dialogue.Page: Really? But.. I thought I saw...
Um, nevermind. Thanks for telling me, astronaut! Good luck in space!
Oh! Did you see this second comet too, astronaut? That means..
It's real! It has to be real! There really is a second comet in the star system nobody's ever known about!
Today's your launch day, right? You're going to fly to it and explore this comet, aren't you? Aren't you?!
Ooh, I wonder what you'll find there.. You've gotta tell me the dirt when you get back, astronaut! We've discovered a whole new comet in our star system!
